text: Drissa Diarrassouba, (born 15 November 1994 in Abidjan, Ivory Coast) is an Ivorian professional footballer who plays as a forward, and is a former Ivory Coast national youth player.Drissa Diarrassouba Retrieved 2017-08-16. ==Club career== ===FC Shirak=== Drissa Diarrassouba joined the Armenian Premier League side FC Shirak in 2014. In January 2016, Diarrassouba signed a three- year contract with Shirak. ===Padideh=== Drissa joined the Persian Gulf Pro League side Padideh on 29 July 2016 with a one-year contract.Padideh signs Drissa Diarrassouba ===Pyunik=== Diarrassouba left FC Pyunik on 3 August 2018. ===Gandzasar Kapan=== In August 2018, Diarrassouba joined Gandzasar Kapan. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Armenian Premier League players Category:Persian Gulf Pro League players Category:FC Shirak players Category:Shahr Khodro F.C. players Category:FC Pyunik players Category:FC Gandzasar Kapan players Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Iran Category:Expatriate footballers in Armenia Category:Association football forwards
title: Drissa Diarrassouba
